== Ezhupunna (CT) (628216) ==

Ezhupunna (CT) is a town in the [[Cherthala]] taluka of [[Alappuzha]] district with an area of 14.18 sq. km. and harbouring 6686 households with total population of 27528 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Alappuzha]] is at a distance of 35 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 240 km. Male population is 13478 and female population is 14050. Scheduled Caste population is 4964 and Scheduled Tribes population is 96. Census Location Code of the town is 628216<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Alappuzha (m + og) at a distance of 35 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 56 km. Railway station is at Ezhupunna at a distance of 0 km.
